00018 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00019                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00020 {
00021     // Check the number of arguments
00022     if (nrhs<1 || (nrhs%2)!=1 || nlhs>1)
00023         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00024     
00025     // Argument vector
00026     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00027     
00028     // Option processing
00029     int flags = 1;
00030     for (int i=1; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00031         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00032         if (key == "Flags")
00033             flags = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00034         else
00035             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00036     }
00037     
00038     // Process
00039     string filename(rhs[0].toString());
00040     Mat m(imread(filename, flags));
00041     if (m.data==NULL)
00042         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","imread failed");
00043     // OpenCV's default is BGR while Matlab's is RGB
00044     if (m.type()==CV_8UC3)
00045         cvtColor(m,m,CV_BGR2RGB);
00046     plhs[0] = MxArray(m);
00047 }
